mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ohio Room, Mt. Vernon Mansion. Nellie Custis' Music Room.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the Mansion's little parlor, looking towards the north wall. The view shows the harpsichord, relic case, and swords above the door. The following text is printed directly onto the reverse of the cardboard mount: Ohio Room, Mt. Vernon Mansion. Nellie Custis' Room. Copyright by the Mount Vernon Ladies' Union Association. Luke C. Dillon, Authorized Photographer, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penna. Avenue, Washington City, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion interior
Little Parlor
